title: on it by section 4(5) of the Railway Safety Act 2005 (No. 31 of 2005), hereby
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Railway Safety Act 2005
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Railway Safety Act 2005 

(Section 4(5)) (Specified Infrastructure, Monorail) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited railway safety act 2005 (section 4(5)) (specified infrastructure monorail) regulation 2021

title: on it by section 4(5) of the Railway Safety Act 2005 (No. 31 of 2005), hereby
heading: 2. Monorail infrastructure is specified to be a railway for the purposes of
text_raw:
2. Monorail infrastructure is specified to be a railway for the purposes of 

the Railway Safety Act 2005.
text_norm: 2 monorail infrastructure specified railway purpose railway safety act 2005

title: on it by section 4(5) of the Railway Safety Act 2005 (No. 31 of 2005), hereby
heading: In these Regulations ‘monorail’ means a single rail serving as a track
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations ‘monorail’ means a single rail serving as a track 

for rolling stock. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Commission for 
Railway Regulation, 

10 November, 2021. 

BRIAN HIGGISSON, 

Commissioner. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [589] 3
text_norm: 3 regulation monorail mean single rail serving track rolling stock given official seal commission railway regulation 10 november 2021 brian higgisson commissioner notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 12th november 2021 589 3

title: on it by section 4(5) of the Railway Safety Act 2005 (No. 31 of 2005), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to a legal 
interpretation) 

The Commission for Railway Regulation, being of the opinion it is appropriate 
to do so in the interest of the safety of persons, made these Regulations under 
section 4(5) to specify that monorail infrastructure is a railway for the purposes 
of the Railway Safety Act 2005. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [589]
